name: sourness

sourness noun [U]
(TASTE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of having a sour taste: A mixture of sweetness, sourness, and saltiness all combined together to create this unforgettable flavour . Natural yogurt can be added to the mixture at this stage, adding a nice sourness to the taste.
More examplesFewer examplesSome sourness and bitterness are desirable, to keep the coffee from tasting bland.Add lime juice to the desired sourness and fish sauce to attain the proper saltiness.This is what gives the characteristic sourness to sourdough breads.
